Applying for jobs right now feels like Ghost Adventures. You’re wandering through haunted job boards yelling, “Is there anyone here?” while 10,000 AI-generated resumes float by.

So here’s the move: stop applying, start job hacking.
In this video, I show you how to use ChatGPT to audit a company’s website and make it look like you spent hours researching them — when really, AI did 95% of the work.

You’ll learn how to:

Run a free Lighthouse audit in Chrome (a.k.a. “the thing that exposes bad websites”)
Feed it into Chat
title: JOB HACKING WITH AI - AUDIT THEIR WEBSITE!
